short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mention your mates in different webpage around the web in Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can mention your mates on every site you visit. After registering, add some mates from m@tes section. 
Click the blue @ icon at the bottom left of every page that you visit and type @ to get the names that you have added.Then you can tag them on the current site with custom messages! 

Updates: 
1. Fixed minor bugs
3. Added Icons for support.
